alert.note: Alert for York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 5:59PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT YORK COUNTY THROUGH 630 PM EDT... At 559 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Mechanicsburg to Weigelstown to near Spry to near Parkville. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... York, Lower Allen, Weigelstown, New Cumberland, Parkville, Red Lion, Spry, Dallastown, Shiloh, East York, Stonybrook-Wilshire, West York, Shrewsbury, Codorus, Grantley, Valley Green, Tyler Run-Queens Gate, Manchester, Hallam and Emigsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for south central Pennsylvania.
